name: Wrenches
description: For opening the nuts, you need to use the wrenches. Wrenches are available in various models.

name: Ratchet
description: A ratchet consist of bar or wheel with a set of angled teeth that fits into the tooth allowing the movement in any one direction.

name: Wire strippers and Cutters
description: There are the wire strippers that come in diameters of different sizes.

name: Nut Drivers
description: There are the nut drivers and they are used for nuts in the same manner as the screw drivers are used for the screws.

name: Quick change Chuck in air hammer
description: If you have to change the air hammer then in that case you will find that you are wasting a lot of energy while changing.

name: Greasing guns
description: Similarly there are the greasing guns and the glue guns. You can easily understand how good the greasing guns are and how useful they can be.

name: Cutting tools
description: For cutting there are the tools like cutting knifes and the wire strippers.
